exceptions.exn: No such bound variable b (possible names are: A, R, P, x and a).

original: intros x a b H. apply clos_trans_ind with (b := b). - intros x1 y H1. apply Lt_hd. auto. - intros y z H1 H2. apply clos_trans. + auto. + auto. - apply d_conc with (l := x) in H. destruct (desc_prefix x a H) as [H3]. * apply app_eq_unit in H3 as [[H4 H5] | [H6 H7]]. -- rewrite H4. apply d_one. -- rewrite <- H5. apply d_one. * auto.
